nodes.text: Star Wars Trilogy: Special Letterbox Collector's Edition
The Star Wars Trilogy: Special Letterbox Collector's Edition is a 1992 boxed set home-video collection of the Star Wars original trilogy in VHS format. It was released by FoxVideo Inc.

Included in the set are letterbox wide-screen versions of the films Star Wars, The Empire Strikes Back, and Return of the Jedi; the documentary From Star Wars to Jedi: The Making of a Saga; a special abridged version of George Lucas: The Creative Impulse by Charles Champlin; a Certificate of Authenticity with a message by George Lucas; and a Deluxe Holographic Gift Box with a hologram portrait of the Star Wars characters.
